医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现考虑性别可提高心力衰竭 CMR 生物标志物的精确度和预后性能研究人员调查了性别对心力衰竭（HF）诊断中左心室充盈压（LVFP）的心脏磁共振（CMR）评估的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af494145-2fab-4916-99dc-12d9f311fdba Fri, 17 May 2024 12:21:00 -0400 Study finds accounting for sex improves precision and prognostic performance of CMR biomarkers for heart failure
血液中的蛋白质可以在人们诊断癌症之前七年多向人们发出癌症警告英国研究人员利用观察和遗传学方法对英国生物银行的参与者调查了 1,463 种血浆蛋白与 19 种癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2283578-c5e3-428e-8a3b-97812c7c805b Fri, 17 May 2024 11:36:00 -0400 Proteins in the blood could warn people of cancer more than seven years before it is diagnosed
充分利用酶标仪：使用建议在本次采访中，NewsMed 与 Ann-Cathrin Volz 和 Martin Mangold 讨论了酶标仪和使用建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Get-the-best-out-of-your-microplate-reader-recommendations-for-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Get-the-best-out-of-your-microplate-reader-recommendations-for-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6c70496-2b40-41d2-b85e-26923acbd959 Fri, 17 May 2024 09:07:00 -0400 Get the best out of your microplate reader: recommendations for use
创新的静电采样器增强了对空气传播病毒的快速监测包括 SARS-CoV-2 在内的病毒通过空气传播，一直是人口密集的多用途设施中预防感染的重点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Innovative- electrostatic-sampler-enhances-rapid-monitoring-of-airborne-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Innovative- electrostatic-sampler-enhances-rapid-monitoring-of-airborne-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9de5750-4986-46e4-bbdd-5c411b82d49c Fri, 17 May 2024 09:05:00 -0400 Innovative electrostatic sampler enhances rapid monitoring of airborne viruses
小鼠的社交时差与体重增加和血糖升高有关经历“社交时差”的小鼠表现出与具有相同现象的人相似的特征，包括体重显着增加、血糖水平升高和心血管健康水平较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Social-jet-lag-in-mice-linked-to-weight-gain-and-higher-blood-sugar.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Social-jet-lag-in-mice-linked-to-weight-gain-and-higher-blood-sugar.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=196ed138-f216-4dd4-9ffa-86288227ee0c Fri, 17 May 2024 08:57:00 -0400 Social jet lag in mice linked to weight gain and higher blood sugar
新测试增强了大血管闭塞中风的早期检测中风是全世界残疾的主要原因，也是第二大死亡原因，但正确的早期干预可以防止严重后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/New-test-enhances-early-detection-of-large-vessel-occlusion-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/New-test-enhances-early-detection-of-large-vessel-occlusion-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32694d25-33cc-42e1-b309-c8e0a72570f1 Fri, 17 May 2024 08:49:00 -0400 New test enhances early detection of large vessel occlusion stroke
FDA 批准 Nova 的 Stat Profile Prime Plus 分析仪用于微毛细管样品模式Nova Biomedical 很高兴地宣布美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 已批准 Stat Profile Prime Plus® 重症监护分析仪上的微毛细管样本模式使用 510(k) 许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c4da5da-d711-4fad-bf29-04fb4efb322a Fri, 17 May 2024 08:48:00 -0400 FDA clears Nova’s Stat Profile Prime Plus analyzer for micro capillary sample mode
阳光和公益事业：Bedfont® Scientific 的团队在肯特临终关怀中心 2024 年风信子步行活动中筹集重要资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Sunshine-and-Steps-for-a-Cause-Bedfontc2ae-Scientifice28099s-Team-Raise-Vital-Funds-at-Heart-of-Kent-Hospicee28099s-风信子-Walk-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Sunshine-and-Steps-for-a-Cause-Bedfontc2ae-Scientifice28099s-Team-Raise-Vital-Funds-at-Heart-of-Kent-Hospicee28099s-风信子-Walk-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ac922f5-e2d9-445e-b9d3-2c5b1efce16e Fri, 17 May 2024 08:45:00 -0400 Sunshine and Steps for a Cause: Bedfont® Scientific’s Team Raise Vital Funds at Heart of Kent Hospice’s Bluebell Walk 2024.
AGA 发布关于治疗巴雷特食管及相关肿瘤的新循证指南美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 今天在《胃肠病学》上发表的《巴雷特食管及相关肿瘤内镜根除治疗新循证临床实践指南》为巴雷特食管患者制定了更新的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/AGA-releases-new-evidence-based-guideline-on-managing-Barretts-esophagus-and-lated-neoplasia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/AGA-releases-new-evidence-based-guideline-on-managing-Barretts-esophagus-and-lated-neoplasia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=195007bb-9786-4454-8821-a125b4dc44ee Fri, 17 May 2024 08:41:00 -0400 AGA releases new evidence-based guideline on managing Barrett's esophagus and related neoplasia
创新的 DL4MicEverywhere 平台利用 AI 彻底改变显微镜图像分析来自葡萄牙古尔本基安科学学院 (IGC) 的研究团队与芬兰 Åbo Akademi 大学、AI4Life 联盟和其他合作者一起开发了一个名为 DL4MicEverywhere 的创新开源平台，该平台今天发表在《自然方法》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Innovative-DL4MicEverywhere-platform-revolutionizes-microscopy-image-analysis-with-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Innovative-DL4MicEverywhere-platform-revolutionizes-microscopy-image-analysis-with-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=937e933a-4a68-4acb-b617-e6083aa3f916 Fri, 17 May 2024 08:34:00 -0400 Innovative DL4MicEverywhere platform revolutionizes microscopy image analysis with AI
